code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'Home'},{path:'/gallery',label:'Gallery'},{path:'/demo',label:'Live Demo'},{path:'/pitch',label:'For Partners'},{path:'/contact',label:'Contact'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"main-navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-brand",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"WebWorld"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"AI Characters in Living Stories"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-links",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,className:`nav-link ${location.pathname===item.path?'active':''}`,children:item.label},item.path))})]});};export default Navigation;
